name: DEATH is necessary..
description:
A platformer puzzle game where in order to complete the level you must die.. a couple of times. Each time you die, your old body stands in your place of death allowing you to jump on it, use it to trigger pressure plates and more.

This game was made in less than a week for the Kindred Community Jam where the theme was "Death is a new beginning".  I interpreted this theme as: each time you die, a path opens up.

Credit to Kevin MacLeod for the in-game music.
